name: uns-typescript-lib-template
description: A template to create Typescript Libraries
author: Ulises Schreiner

scripts.prerelease:checks: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test:coverage && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease:checks && standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease:checks && standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease:checks && standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:rc: npm run prerelease:checks && standard-version --prerelease rc && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public --tag next
scripts.release:final:patch: npm run prerelease:checks && standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:final:minor: npm run prerelease:checks && standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:final:major: npm run prerelease:checks && standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
